name: Coco Avocado
description: Coco Avocado (or Es Alpukat Kelapa in Indonesian) is a popular beverage in Indonesia, usually sold as one of the street foods. If you are exhausted after an intense working or studying, this dessert might help you chill out.

ingredients.ingredient: Condensed milk, palm sugar, or honey for sweetener

directions: Put the whole cup of ice cube to a blender.
Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit.
Scoop out all the inside and add them on the blender.
Add the sweetener of your preference.
Open up a coconut and put away the coconut water.
Scoop out the tender coconut inside and add it to the blender.
Pour the drink into a serving glass.
You can add more ice cubes or slushed ice to make it fresher!
